name: Naturehike Rock-40L/60L+5L Internal Frame Hiking backpacking backpack, Camping Waterproof Bag, Ultralight Outdoor Daypack with Rain Cover for Hiking, Backpacking,Camping Survival(60+5L)
short_description: 【Size and Weight】Product size of our hiking backpack is about 26.37"x10.23"x7.08"(:67x26x18cm), Regular style backpack weights just 2.55 pounds(1.16kg), Upgraded style backpack weights just 2.55 pounds(1.16kg). 60+5L large capacity, and it maximum load is about 30.86 pounds (14kg). This Durable and comfortable backpack is suitable for women and men for outdoor adventures.

【High Quality Fabric】 Our Upgraded style backpack are made of wear-resistant high molecular weight polyethylene fiber which is soft and easy to bend, has a high energy absorption rate, better resistance to abrasion and higher impact strength than other thermoplastic materials.The bottom of the backpack contains a rain cover, double waterproof and dustproof, let you enjoy your outdoor adventure.

【Professional Backpack】Ergonomic design, close to the human back shape of EVA, three-dimensional frame stitched to the inside of the backpack, shoulder straps are made of double-layer EVA material, and two-way tension design at the waist, top side adjustable and removable DIY wind rope. Our hiking backpacks are designed for outdoor traveling enthusiasts.

【Backpack External Organizer Design】Shoulder strap organizer pockets for keys, cell phone small water cups. Waist organizer pocket for headlamp, data cable. Secondary compartment can be placed clothing snacks. Kangaroo compartment, can put water bag, slippers. Side organizer can hold 2 bottles of water up to 700ml.

【Wide Use】Our comfortable, breathable and large capacity backpack is the perfect companion for your journey, mountaineering, camping or others outdoor activities. Any questions of product, please feel free to contact us, we will respond sincerely and do our best to keep you satisfied.

name: 60L Travel Hiking Camping Backpack with Rain Cover, Backpack Water Resistant,Climbing Backpack for Men Women
short_description: Ample Space and Organizational Efficiency: With a spacious main compartment and multiple pouches, our large travel backpack boasts impressive capacity. The unique drawstring design securely seals the main pocket, preventing items from accidentally falling out. Additionally, the two side pockets allow for easy storage of water bottles, making it an ideal companion for 3 to 4-day trips and meeting airline size requirements.
Inside Separated Pocket for Hydration: The Main Pocket inside contains a separated pocket for Hydration, a Pipe outer for going accross the Hydration pipe, and 360° Rotation Pipe Holder on Straps.
Waterproof Material: The 60L hiking backpack is made from Nylon, very light weight material and strong water resistant and anti-scratches.
Ventilated Straps and Back: Straps and Back of this camping backpack are full of sponge and covered by Mesh Nylon Material, very ventilated and comfortable, no sweats on back.

Enhanced Comfort and Versatility: Introducing our premium Comfortable Large backpack, meticulously crafted for passionate travelers and climbers. Embrace an unparalleled level of comfort with its ergonomic padded shoulder straps and back support, while the breathable mesh and sponge padding alleviate stress from your shoulders. Notably, this big hiking backpack is designed without an internal or external frame, offering enhanced flexibility during your adventures.

short_description: NOT YOUR BASIC BACKPACK: Feature rich at this price point; Comfort and balanced backpack for men and women.

CUSTOM COMFORT: Multi position torso adjustment fits medium and tall adventurers; Durable open-cell foam lumbar pad and molded channels provide maximum comfort and airflow; For beginners or experienced Backpackers
DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND: Great quality and thoughtful design; large sleeping bag compartment, multi directional compression straps, with spacious compartments and pockets, a place for everything
TETON SPORTS PROMISE: Reach out to our AMAZING product support team if you have any questions or concerns; YOU CAN COUNT ON US to get you taken care of and back OUTDOORS
product_description: Gear up for your next adventure with the Teton Scout Backpack, an affordable choice designed for shorter torsos. Featuring a ¾ frame that fits kids and smaller adults just right, this backpack ensures a comfortable and secure fit. Stay dry with the integrated rain cover, providing durable backpacking protection against unexpected showers. Adjustable torso back panel and straps allow you to customize the carrying experience, distributing weight comfortably. Capacity is ideal for 1-3 day hiking trips. The Teton Scout Backpack is your comfortable, dependable, and easy companion on the trail.

name: Osprey Ariel Plus 60 Women's Backpacking Backpack - Prior Season
product_description: A reliable women's-specific pack that goes the extra mile when needed, the Ariel Plus 60 is ready for anything Mother Nature throws its way. The Custom Fit-On-The-Fly Hipbelt and Shoulder Strap allow you to dial in the perfect fit and a close-to-body carry stabilizes the load when the trail turns technical. The top lid detaches and converts into a daypack for side excursions. Constructed with high quality bluesign®-approved high-tenacity nylon and PFC-free DWR. The framesheet maintains comfortable back contact with ventilated airflow channels and maximum stability for carrying heavy loads while the mesh-covered foam lumbar creates supportive, lightweight and comfortable contact surfaces. The extendible hipbelt allows for incremental length and angle adjustments which adds a fine-tuned fit for varying waist sizes. The Crossbody ErgoPull hipbelt pulls the pack weight into the lumbar when hipbelt is tightened for a better distribution of weight and, in turn, a better carry.
